html:
9.1.18  6:12 pm   Were doors invented to let things in or keep things out

     the door-way was invented to let things in or out. the door panel was invented to close the door way and keep things in or out. i hope i've explained that clearly

9.1.18  5:38 pm   My most overused expression is "interesting", which I use regardless of whether it actually is or not. I annoy the shit out of myself doing it. How do I stop?

     raise the stakes, how about 'oh that's wonderful'

9.1.18  5:27 pm   do you like to play with foam balls

     i use them only for business and serious matters

9.1.18  5:16 pm   what are the last 2 chords of your new thing?

     A7sus4, D

9.1.18  3:47 pm   why didn't you title HOTEWIG history of the entire universe?

     entire world is a phrase that feels more familiar

9.1.18  2:23 pm   i would like to do an intership with u

     i don't know what that means but that could work

9.1.18  1:23 pm   Biscuit cereal or cake

     i wonder if you could combine them some how

9.1.18  1:23 pm   Will you ever use capital letters

     sure

9.1.18  1:08 pm   Whats your favourite Bill Wurtz song

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

9.1.18  12:52 pm   what if the universe was made up of AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

     you would need some kind of huge bang to create all that

9.1.18  12:33 pm   Is there any hidden meaning behind the lyrics in your newest songs?

     i try to make sure you can feel the meaning regardless of whether you can see it

9.1.18  12:31 pm   do people truly have souls?

     sure, if you can figure out what the word even means

9.1.18  12:16 pm   be real, are there any things you learned on your journey that you're not giving credit? like books or how-to stuff for making music,

     i learn things absolutely everywhere but i am vigorously passionate about telling you all about the ones i feel are the most important and significant

      or did you actually just pick up everything forcefully?

     or sometimes gently

9.1.18  11:23 am   how do i make the most of solitude?

     become an entrepreneur

9.1.18  10:39 am   Favourite jazz saxophonist?

     they keep becoming better than each other

9.1.18  10:13 am   What if, just for kicks, you did this anagram right here on the questions page: I love you dad

     the kicks is that it stops the questions process because i do the questions in order. that's why i made the anagrams page, so i can continue with questions and do the anagrams at a different time

9.1.18  9:13 am   pear shaped apples or apple shaped pears?

     oh sure they are that's true

9.1.18  8:46 am   sometimes i think the reason why i want to be successful is that i want to be intensely envied by specific people in my life one day. i don't know, but do you think that this kind of thinking is really conducive to success? (it is motivating).

     that's how a lot of people do it

9.1.18  7:55 am   what is the origin of origins?

     themself

9.1.18  7:16 am   fun fact, if you progressively reduce the time to make each music video by 75% for each video, then on september 9th we will reach a singularity where you produce an infinite number of them in the span of a millisecond

     oh that's a good idea

9.1.18  5:54 am   People don't like me, how do I fix that?

     you can't fix that but you can find the people who do like you

9.1.18  3:41 am   how do you feel about people who say "this person is high" in your comments? i often see the same type of comment on anything "weird" and it really annoys me

     they are probably not high

9.1.18  3:04 am   i have dangerous amounts of unwarranted hope and secretive ambition

     i didn't think you need a warrant for hope

9.1.18  3:03 am   is it possible to make it if you go the whole way telling yourself you won't

     yes and a good trick

9.1.18  1:41 am   i'll never do anything

     ok

9.1.18  1:38 am   bill what was your early life like?

     similar to the way it is now

9.1.18  1:32 am   Do you believe?

     yes





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

8.31.18  11:26 pm   will you ever update your notebook

     i do

8.31.18  10:58 pm   What if there was no Christian God, and only Zeus, Poseidon and Hades as our Main Gods?

     let's just say the holiday season would be a little bit different

8.31.18  8:02 pm   Do you think you could arrest a lime?

     limes arrest themselves

8.31.18  7:56 pm   So far, do you think you'll be able to finish the new video by Sept. 4th?

     i have no choice

8.31.18  7:13 pm   have you ever thought about upgrading from Logic Pro to some other software? and, would you ever release a compilation of your songs on vinyl if given the oppurtunity?

     to logic pro would be the upgrade for me

8.31.18  7:06 pm   so there's this conspiracy theory that is supported by many people who are most definitely not me that says that every answer you give to every question on this page is secretly an anagram for a phrase, which when all of them are combined forms a final message, that when converted to binary and inverting every bit, forms an mp3 file with your musical magnum opus. care to comment? asking for a friend

     that would have to be the world's most inefficient way to communicate

8.31.18  6:57 pm   https://youtu.be/OYtLmgtxy4g were the clips of you speaking in this video made for the video or from a reality thing u cut up? cause it looks like it could be from reality tbh

     made for the video

8.31.18  6:42 pm   do you like cough syrup?

     no

8.31.18  5:48 pm   is video significantly different in style as a result of the irrefutable fact that it is coming out on sept 4?

     might be similar to the way i was working when i was doing daily vines while working on history of japan

      it seems like you will have to cut lots of corners to condense what is usually 2 months of work into 25% of the time

     it's not bad

8.31.18  5:38 pm   will you start making short vids again? just asking.

     i would prefer to make videos of a wide range of lengths. from 1 second to 10 minutes. i have already made hundreds that are less than 20 seconds

8.31.18  5:32 pm   Do you think "za" is a socially acceptable abbreviation of pizza? Asking for a friend.

     in some regions

8.31.18  5:10 pm   How do I know you're not an alien?

     do you

8.31.18  4:42 pm   is art an industry?

     sure

8.31.18  3:11 pm   Do you get a high from intensely working for a long period of time?

     yes

8.31.18  2:39 pm   what's the first letter of the first word in your new thing

     i

8.31.18  2:19 pm   Have you considered using other tuning systems than equal temperament?

      yes, and after a deep round of experiments i concluded i never will

8.31.18  2:09 pm   can you please write a book? i'd love reading it

     i write constantly but i use computers instead, hopefully they don't break knock on wood

8.31.18  1:33 pm   Why are your videos entertaining to the entire American civilization I know?

     i bribed them

8.31.18  1:00 pm   did the anagrams section on the site come from people asking you for anagrams on here?

     i always wanted to do it but then i started getting requests here so i made a page for it

8.31.18  11:17 am   should i shut the front door, or open it?

     open then shut. hopefully that will give you a chance to go through it

8.31.18  11:13 am   Bill, How do I find what makes me tick? 

     write down the 5 greatest moments in your life you can remember. see if you notice anything in common with any of them

8.31.18  11:06 am   have you considered writing a longer piece of music? like a simphony?

     my general feeling is that once you exceed 4 minutes you might as well integrate visual and many other elements too, such as dialogue, plot points, and more

8.31.18  10:29 am   Why are your videos so good

     to hopefully get us all out of jail (free)
